Title: Torture
Plot: Darwyn is ordered by a terrorist group to get a weapon, but the FBI doesn't want to cooperate. Ilija gets ready to run away to Europe.  Farik is sent to Saudi Arabia where  torture is allowed.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, sex scenes and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Daniel Kash,  Sarah Shahi,  Jay R. Ferguson,  Vinicius Machado
